name: Write a science fiction novel
blurb: How good is the AI model at writing long-form text? This variant has a not-very detailed prompt, leaving it to the model to draw from it's own knowledge

initial_prompt.content: Can you write a science fiction novel for me. I want it to be about some explorers setting up a base on a new planet, written in the style of classical sci-fi authors such as Arthur C. Clarke, Isaac Asimov and Robert A. Heinlein. Output the novel into the file index.html
